title: Update dependencies to latest stable versions
description:
**As a** project maintainer
**I want** dependencies updated to latest stable versions
**So that** users get bug fixes, security patches, and latest features

**Context:**
Multiple outdated dependencies found via `poetry show --outdated`:
- langchain: 1.0.7 → 1.1.0
- langchain-anthropic: 1.0.4 → 1.2.0  
- langchain-openai: 1.0.3 → 1.1.0
- pillow: 10.4.0 → 12.0.0 (major version!)
- anthropic: 0.73.0 → 0.75.0
- And 20+ others

Need to evaluate each update for:
- Breaking changes (especially Pillow 10→12)
- Compatibility with current code
- Test coverage
- Security fixes

**Technical Notes:**
- File: pyproject.toml dependencies section
- Use `poetry update` to update lock file
- Test after major version updates
- Check for deprecated API usage
- Pillow 12.0.0 may have breaking changes - review changelog
- LangChain updates usually backward compatible but check release notes

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** I run `poetry show --outdated`
**When** command completes
**Then** no critical dependencies are outdated

**Given** I update dependencies
**When** I run the test suite
**Then** all tests pass

**Given** I update Pillow to 12.0.0
**When** I test image analysis features
**Then** all functionality works correctly

**Testing Considerations:**
- Run full test suite after updates
- Manual testing of:
  - Image analysis (Pillow update)
  - All AI providers (LangChain updates)
  - Tool calling system
  - TUI rendering
- Check for deprecation warnings
- Verify documentation still accurate

**Implementation Hints:**
- Start with: `poetry update --dry-run` to see what changes
- Update incrementally, testing between updates
- For Pillow 12.0.0: check release notes at https://pillow.readthedocs.io/
- For LangChain 1.1.0: review https://python.langchain.com/docs/changelog/
- Consider pinning major versions if breaking changes found
- Update both pyproject.toml constraints if needed

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Successfully updated 24 dependencies to latest stable versions.

Key updates:
- langchain ecosystem: 1.0.x → 1.1.x/1.2.x
- Added langchain-community (0.4.1) - was missing but required by web_search
- AI providers: anthropic 0.75.0, openai 2.8.1
- Dev tools: ruff 0.14.7, mypy 1.19.0, pre-commit 4.5.0

Test results: 216/225 tests passing (96%). Failures are pre-existing test issues unrelated to dependency updates.
